alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 14 at 6:32PM CST until January 16 at 10:18AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting southwestern Crow Wing and northwestern Morrison Counties. .A suspected ice jam downstream of the river level gage on the Mississippi River near Fort Ripley is increasing water levels upstream and may lead to lowland flooding along the Mississippi River near Fort Ripley. Due to the nature of ice jam flooding, fluctuations in waters levels of 1 to 3 feet are possible. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT FOR THE MISSISSIPPI RIVER NEAR FORT RIPLEY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is possible. Fluctuations in waters levels of 1 to 3 feet are possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River near Fort Ripley. * WHEN...From early Monday morning to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.5 feet, Flooding of low lying areas adjacent the river is expected. At 11.0 feet, This will cause minor flooding of rural areas near Fort Ripley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...Already increasing water levels are expected to continue to rise Sunday night and minor flood stage may be reached early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and to the National Weather Service in Duluth when you can do so safely. Flooding can be reported to the National Weather Service at 1-800-685-8612. More information about river flooding is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 1215 PM CST.
